entry.title: PAVÉ SIGNET RING BLACK GOLD
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: ring
Price: 1420.00

Pavé Signet Ring

Our signature Galaxia collection features a wide spectrum of styles designed to intrigue anyone feigning interest in the Cosmos. Embellished with black and white diamonds, pearls and moonstones, this collection uses many of Earths stunning materials to reflect the galaxy surrounding us. As vast as the universe may be, all of us must remember that we are amongst the stars. 

  • 18-karat black gold ring
  • Set with 0.19 ctw black diamonds
  • Set with 0.04 ctw whitediamonds
  • Measurements 1 cm diameter
  • Brilliant Cut
  • Color: H-G
  • Clarity: VS1-VS2
  • Conflict free diamonds
  • Ships in 3 to 4 weeks

﻿Ring Size Guide

entry.title: Bold Star Ring Enamel, 15 colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: ring
Price: 3971.00

Bold Star Ring Enamel, 15 colors

Colette began working with colorful enamel as a way of injecting a little humor & playfulness into her most recognized collection, Galaxia. Highly influenced by Warhol & Kandinsky, this series features a punchy color palette that meant to evoke a feeling of pure joy. 

18-Karat yellow gold Bold Blue Star Ring

  • Set with 0.59 carats of white diamonds
  • Slips On
  • Brilliant Cut
  • Color: H-G
  • Clarity: VS1-VS2
  • Conflict free diamonds

Ring Size Guide

 

This product may not be in stock. In the case it is custom please allow 2-3 weeks for production and shipment, possibly sooner. We will send a confirmation of the order email to make sure of the details.

Made in the USA

entry.title: Bryanna Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Ring
Price: 4225.00

Bryanna Ring

The Atame Collection is the physical embodiment of the liaison between lovers; totally attached, very fluid and romantic. “Atame” meaning “tie me up” in Spanish, is all about lovers sharing a life, while equally being tied up in one another. 

  • 18-karat black gold ring
  • Set with 1.03 ctw white diamonds
  • Two Piece Ring Set 
  • Ships Immediately

entry.title: Heart Penacho Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Ring
Price: 3320.00

Heart Penacho Ring

Penacho is inspired by Colette’s Mexican heritage, paying homage to Aztec culture. In creating this vibrant collection, Colette looked to traditional Aztec regalia, and was influenced by the importance of feathers in Aztecan headdresses.

Traditional headdresses are made with vibrant feathers, similar to that of a hummingbird.  Huitzilopochtli, translating to “Hummingbird of the Left”, is the God of sun and war.  Aztecs believed that warriors who lost their lives in battle would return as hummingbirds.  Colette carefully selected hard stones such as malachite, lápiz lazuli, onyx, mother of pearl and diamonds for the foundation of this collection. Set in 18-karat gold, Penacho brings to life the beauty of the Mexican and Aztec culture.

  • 18-karat yellow gold ring
  • Set with 0.68 ctw multicolor Sapphires
  • Color: H-G
  • Clarity: VS1-VS2
  • Conflict free diamonds
  • Ships in 2 weeks
